pluggable.name: Autoclose
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Automatically close comments on posts older than a given number of days.

help.value:
Configure Habari to close comments on all posts after a set number of days. For example, with this plugin you can configure Habari to close comments on all posts older than 20 days.

When you disable this plugin, all posts that had their comments closed automatically by this plugin, will have them re-enabled.
